description:
The first meetup will be about getting to know each other and seeing what everyone would like to get out of the meetups.

Schedule (for now)


• Meet and greet 

• A short presentation of Ember.js: the pain it solves, the architecture of the framework and some examples of cool stuff that you can do with it.

• Feel free to present your own Ember project, a particular aspect of the framework or a cool Ember trick that you know


Location
I'm still looking for a room with a projector that we can rent for an evening. We would then split the costs among the present Emberists. Or if you such a place at your disposition, let us know!
name: Meetup #1 for Ember.js

description:
After the success of the first meetup, it wouldn't make sense not to pursue the Brussels Ember.js meetups.


Location
I will check if we can use the room at the ICAB again. I don't expect any problems there but I will set the location once confirmed.

UDATE: It's ok, we can have the same room as for the first meetup. It's Salle Fénix at Betacowork / ICAB at 4 Rue des Pères Blancs, 1040 Etterbeek. The door will probably be locked so give me a call on[masked] when you're there, I'll come open for you.


Change of date

Because of unavailability, the date has been changed to the 4th of December. Sorry about the relatively late change, hopefully you can still come! 

Topics

• Yoran: talk about a live polling system in Ember.js

• Yoran: talk about loading animations in Ember.js

• ?
name: Meetup #2

description:
Schedule

• Yoran: "How to test your Ember app"


• Boris: "Boost the loading time of your Ember app with data pre-loading"

• Yoran: "How to call A from B in Ember"


UPDATE (10/05/2014)

The location has been changed to "Salle Azzar" instead of "Salle Fénix". The building and the address remain the same though. Since you need a card to get access to the building, please call me on[masked] or shoot me an email when you're there. I will come open for you.


UPDATE (28/04/2014)

A new meetup has been scheduled for Thursday 15th of May. As for the previous meetups, the Betagroup is so kind to provide us with a venue at the ICAB in Etterbeek.

I will do a talk on how to test your Ember single-page application, mainly based on my experiences building the Hstry application. I will also present a short cheat sheet on how to make calls between the various layers in Ember.js.

If you have anything you want to share, be it a nice hack, an interesting way of doing something in Ember, or anything related to Ember, please tell me and we'll add you to the schedule!

Dear Embeerists,


I want to continue the monthly schedule of Ember.js meetups and therefore, the third meetup is in the pipeline. Since not much is going on end of December and early January, we can do it end of January. The problem from my side is that I'm going away for three weeks from 8th until 29th of January. So there are two options:


• Would anyone want to organize the meetup while I'm away? I can take care of getting the room beforehand so all you'll need to do is maybe have some topics and prepare something to talk about.

• If not, we can do it in February when I'm back.


Cheers!

Yoran
how_to_find_us: You need a card to get access to the ICAB, please call me on 0495991722 or shoot me an email when you're there. I will come open for you. In case you get in, the room is on the first floor.
name: Meetup #3

description:
We're back for a 4th meetup! This time, TenForce is opening its doors and letting the meetup take place at their offices. This means that the meetup will take place in Leuven this time.

Schedule


We've got some interesting talks lined up.

• Introduction to Ember.js. For the people that weren't there at the previous meetups and who want to know more about the Ember.js framework, we are doing an introduction talk. We will give a brief overview of the framework, its architecture, and how you can learn more about it.

• What's changed in Ember.js (lightning talk). Ember.js 1.6 was released recently. We will go over some major changes that have occurred recently, as well as what is yet to come.


• Speed up development with Emacs's ember-mode (lightning talk). Co-organizer Aad is a passionate Emacs user and will present the ember-mode plugin that he recently released on GitHub.

• Ember Data and JSON APIs. The jsonapi.org initiative was launched recently as an attempt to standardize the JSON communication between server and browser. We will go over what this means for Ember.js, how you can take advantage of this for your application, but also how you can implement your own Ember adapters and serializers if you're using a legacy API.

There will be a break somewhere the third and fourth talk. Furthermore, there will be the opportunity for attendees to make announcements. We will close off with some drinks.


Sponsors

As with the previous meetups, Hstry is taking care of the organization as well as the beer provisioning.

TenForce is providing the venue for this meetup.
name: Meetup #4 - ember-mode for Emacs, JSON APIs and Ember Data, and more

description:
Meetup #5 is going to take place on the 29th of October. Since the last meetup took place in Leuven, we will go back to Brussels this time.

Location


The meetup will take place at the ICAB in the room Planes 2.


Schedule

We are still looking for speakers. As for now, the schedule looks as follows:

• ember-cli addons. Jean-Baptiste will give a talk about how ember-cli addons: what they are, how to use them and how to create one.

• Authentication with ember-simple-auth. Boris will talk about how to implement authentication in your app using the ember-simple-auth library. There will some live coding involved!

Sponsors

• Hstry: organization and beer

• Betacowork: venue


UPDATE (21/10)

The location has been booked. It will take place at the ICAB as usual but this time in the room Planes 2. 

Also, Jean-Baptiste will give a talk about how ember-cli addons: what they are, how to use them and how to create one. 

Furthermore, Boris will talk about authentication in Ember.js apps using the ember-simple-auth library.
name: Meetup #5 - ember-cli addons and more
